storyInfo: The party originally plans to seek help from a wise High Priest in the area, but Marcille is unexpectedly overwhelmed by all the new information and accidentally eats a poisonous fruit, sending the tribe into chaos.

attributes.content: Hurry up, Laios.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Look at this mushroom! Even the dungeon's walking mushrooms don't grow this big!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Wouldn't it be amazing to see a walking mushroom this size...? Thoughts on having it for lunch later?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Careful now. The Gourmet Guide says jungle mushrooms are basically all poisonous to some extent.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: For example, they might give you full body rashes, thicken your blood, or make you throw up nonstop until every organ is down on the floor...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: ...I'd rather not think about what the guide's author must have been through to learn all that in such detail.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: The orcs only taught me how to identify dungeon mushrooms, so we'd best leave these alone.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: But there are some animals that eat them!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Still no. If only one or two critters consider it edible, it means it's probably toxic to everything else.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: In other words, if we see lots of animals eating this, then it's likely to be edible for us, too.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Right...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: (Low roar)
What was that?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: (Piercing buzzing)
There's something flying towards us! Careful, everyone!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: WAAAAAAHHHH!
attributes.name: Laios's Party

attributes.content: (Knocks here and there)
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Ha! Now that was an impressive explosion!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: A good thing the test site was empty.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Let me see...
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Chamber pressure, off the charts. Same goes for temperature readings, and load capacity too!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Seems like it'll need reinforcement to perform well.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Next, final adjustments to the previous configuration, loosen the belt, tighten the screws, and... done!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: My newest masterpiece, the 'Invincible Cool Thing' will be fully operational. As long as I don't run into another accident!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Oh, I should get rid of all these explosives first.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Safety first! Avoid open flames...
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: (Knocks here and there)
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* That thing over there keeps blowing up...!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*...!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: You alright, Marcille?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I-I'm fine! Just a little dizzy...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: (Low roar)
There's more...! Careful!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: A golem? Maybe a gargoyle?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Taste my magic—
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: BOOM—!!!
High Priest, High Priest? You there?

attributes.name: Marcille
attributes.content: ...What was that?

attributes.name: Marcille
attributes.content: —Wagh!
A crocodile?! Or a beast-man with a crocodile head?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Huh? What's a beast-man?
attributes.name: Gator-headed Beast-man

attributes.content: He can speak too!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Why wouldn't I be able to? Hey, you there, Durins, did you crawl up from the underground?
attributes.name: Gator-headed Beast-man

attributes.content: 'Durins'?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Is he talking about us?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: See any other short ones around here?
attributes.name: Gator-headed Beast-man

attributes.content: Are you saying me and Chilchuck look like the same race to you?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Don't you guys have 'Half-foot' here?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: ...What are you talking about? Is something wrong with you all?
attributes.name: Gator-headed Beast-man

attributes.content: Right, have you seen our High Priest here?
attributes.name: Gator-headed Beast-man

attributes.content: High Priest?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Old guy, shorter than me, wears glasses.
attributes.name: Gator-headed Beast-man

attributes.content: What's he doing in such a dangerous place?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Dunno. He thinks in mysterious ways.
attributes.name: Gator-headed Beast-man

attributes.content: Well, we haven't run into any old men.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: He also moves in mysterious ways.
attributes.name: Gator-headed Beast-man

attributes.content: Guess I should just give up and get back to the tribe, then. Like all the times I went out and looked for him before.
attributes.name: Gator-headed Beast-man

attributes.content: Goodbye, strange tourists!
attributes.name: Gator-headed Beast-man

attributes.content: Wait! Could I ask if you've heard of Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Heh. Lucky for you, but also unlucky. Because I feel like I have, but also not.
attributes.name: Gator-headed Beast-man

attributes.content: There's someone else in the tribe who I'm sure knows where this Whatever Island is though.
attributes.name: Gator-headed Beast-man

attributes.content: But that person happens to be...
attributes.name: Gator-headed Beast-man

attributes.content: That High Priest you're looking for?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Bingo.
attributes.name: Gator-headed Beast-man

attributes.content: How's this? Come back with me. We hardly ever find him when we go looking, but he always comes back sooner or later.
attributes.name: Gator-headed Beast-man

attributes.content: So basically, you guys were on an island with a huge dungeon, and somehow ended up here?
attributes.name: Bright Gator-headed Beast-man

attributes.content: More or less. Do you know anything about it?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Uh... What's an island?
attributes.name: Bright Gator-headed Beast-man

attributes.content: Huh? It's... a landmass completely surrounded by sea.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: What's a sea?
attributes.name: Bright Gator-headed Beast-man

attributes.content: Um... a large body of water?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: You mean a lake? You really like to use strange words.
attributes.name: Bright Gator-headed Beast-man

attributes.content: Well, is it because we're inland right now and you haven't heard of...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: It's because your questions are so strange! I've never heard of a sea, an island, or a Merini Village. Were you swept here from the other side of Terra by someone's tail or something?
attributes.name: Bright Gator-headed Beast-man

attributes.content: 'Terra'?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: It's what we're standing on right now.
attributes.name: Bright Gator-headed Beast-man

attributes.content: Marcille tries to read the crocodile man's face for any sign he was pranking her.
Unfortunately, the only message she gets from his eyes is 'Am I talking to a fool?'
So in short, the one who calls the shots in this tribe of crocodiles—er, Archosauria—is the High Priest. The one Marcille blew up earlier was his...
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: His mech.
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: The 'Invincible Cool Thing.'
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: But if we blew up his 'mech'... would he still be willing to help us find Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: It's fine. It would've exploded with or without you.
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Always manages to blow up somehow.
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: The High Priest is a friendly man. I'm sure he won't blame you if you just explain everything.
attributes.name: Bright Archosauria

attributes.content: He's also a righteous man. He wouldn't leave a group of lost visitors stranded.
attributes.name: Bright Archosauria

attributes.content: That's our High Priest!
attributes.name: Bright Archosauria

attributes.content: Still, we should come up with a way to make amends.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Don't worry about it—wait, what's that good smell? Who's cooking today?
attributes.name: Bright Archosauria

attributes.content: The Durin with the huge beard.
attributes.name: Archosauria Warrior

attributes.content: Terra, Acahualla, living paintings, the dungeon...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Ugh... I can't wrap my head around it all.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I can use magic here, so at the very least some of the laws of reality are shared...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Falin... I bet I'd be as excited as Laios if you were here.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: *sigh* I miss our days back at the academy.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Back then...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Wait, the berries that those little birds are eating...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: They look like that fruit Falin offered me back then...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Smells great. Are Durins good at cooking too?
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: For the last time, I'm not a Durin... *sigh* Never mind, suit yourself.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Quick, round everyone up to try out this bearded Durin's cooking!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Right, you guys were looking for the High Priest?
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: Yeah. We want to ask him some questions.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: It's true he knows much, but it's hard to meet him. It's easy if he wants to see you; but impossible if he doesn't.
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Sounds like your classic sage type... So how do we get him to want to see us?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Hmm... Zumama said that if we wanted the High Priest to share his wisdom, we should make some noise to attract him!
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: Noise... would a big feast count?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Yeah. Something like that.
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: No objections here. Let's ask Marcille what she thinks.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Speaking of which, where is she?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: She hasn't returned yet?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Damn you, Red Dragon! GIVE FALIN BACK TO ME!!!
attributes.name: Marcille
